VLIB Function Reference

Template Matching

Introduction and Use Cases

Objects can be searched in another image by performaing cross-correlation between template image and search image. Current API currently supports only normalized cross-correlation based template search.

Specification

Function

  • The primary function to perform normalized cross correlation is VLIB_matchTemplate.

APIS

  • VLIB_matchTemplate

References

  1. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross-correlation#Normalized_cross-correlation
